thread.title: Niall
thread.title_full: Passione Vintage recensione scritta da Niall

author: Niall
title: Niall
text:
Purchased Omega Speedmaster Professional last week. Delighted with the watch. Looks even better in the flesh than in the photos. It arrived to Dublin in 4 days, quicker than expected. Really happy with the purchase, I look forward to doing business with Giovanni again in the future!
Regards,
Niall
